name: Find differences on Earth HD
description:
Will you find the differences in these travel around the world photos?
Enjoy unique HD photo set of the beautiful Earth while you try to find the difference between them! This photohunt game will improve your concentration and observation skills playing this free picture puzzle game.
Find the difference before the timer runs out with over 200 high quality pictures. Try to find all diffs and unlock all the 4 continents. If you guess a lot there is a build tin hint system to help you! Boost your or your kids iq. Fight against the clock or relax and spot the difference at your own pace.

Game Features:
- Find all 500 differences in 100 HD photos from around the world
- Beautiful & unique photo camera design interface
- High quality HD 720p photos, optimised for tablets.
- Safe, optimistic images suitable for kids of all ages.
- Each mistake will cost you time against the clock
